snippet: The new exhibition on Louis C. Tiffany samples the Tiffany Studios’ enormous production of stained-glass windows as well as all kinds of other church-related objects.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Museum of Biblical Art exhibit Louis C Tiffany and the Art of Devotion featuring stained-glass windows and other church-related objects.
lead_paragraph: The new exhibition on Louis C. Tiffany samples the Tiffany Studios’ enormous production of stained-glass windows as well as all kinds of other church-related objects.

headline.seo: Louis C. Tiffany Works at Museum of Biblical Art
headline.main: Spiritual Landscapes of the Gilded Age
headline.print_headline: Spiritual Landscapes Of the Gilded Age
